684000.name: Wooden Ocean
684000.description:
The Infinite Hotel, a physical afterlife that worships ancient artists from the 20th-22nd century, has been awarded greatest expression due to its creator's suicide.

As cosmic artists converge to destroy it, you play as Violet, a witch looking for her brother at the edge of the world, not knowing her entire planet is on top of a hotel building.

Features:

Unique RPG epic.

Giant interconnected areas to explore.

Hundreds of learnable skills from 10 weapon types and 21 elements.

Hundreds of different monsters to peacefully kill with violence.

Over a thousand weapons and armor that anyone can equip.

Massive talent tree to further customize your town and team.

Dynamic combat psychology.

Golem.

Ghost Ship.

Card Game.

New Game+.

Super Dungeon.

Super Bosses.

Multiple difficulties.

No max level.

And of course, you unironically saying murda for the rest of your life.

Originally released in the summer of 2016, Wooden Ocean has received consistent updates for the last 9 years, more than tripling its original size and story. These updates will continue long after it's tripled again.
